title: HR Management Practical Competency Enhancement: Online Learning Model (OLM)-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design the structure (modules, activities, assessments) of online math lessons based on the OLM framework
Learners can utilize interactive elements (quizzes, discussion boards, multimedia resources) to enhance learner engagement by over 80% in LMS environments
Learners can develop online instructional materials for one math topic by applying at least three OLM design principles
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
